mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tb_collection WHERE book_id = #{bookId} AND user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT t.tag_name FROM book_tag bt LEFT JOIN tag t ON bt.tag_id = t.tag_id WHERE bt.book_id = #{bookId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_collection WHERE book_id = #{bookId} AND user_id = #{userId}

SELECT b.book_id, b.book_name, b.book_summary, b.book_cover, b.book_number, b.borrowed_times, b.book_author, b.publisher, b.physical_book_price, b.version, b.create_time, b.update_time, b.deleted FROM tb_book b LEFT JOIN tb_collection c ON c.book_id = b.book_id where b.deleted = 0 and c.user_id = #{userId}
